name: my-app
description: Root project to manage frontend and backend apps

scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ENV_PATH=.env.local concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm start --prefix frontend" "npm:start --prefix backend"
scripts.testSocketLocal: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ENV_PATH=.env.local npm run testSocketConnection --prefix frontend
scripts.devFrontend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ENV_PATH=.env.local npm run start --prefix frontend

author: Elmrys / Skyepulse
